An application developed using higher level programming languages, such as Java for Android, is known as a native app.
The name of the official IDE for android app development is called Google Studio.
The official language for android development is Java.
An object is an instance of a class.
In Java the difference between constructor declarations and method declarations is that method declarations use the name of the class and have no return type.
double[] values = new double[10]; - this section of code can be used to construct an array in Java
HTML is the mark-up language used to design UI layouts in Android Studio
XML may not have a closing tag.
onPause() is the state of the current activity in the activity lifecycle when another activity comes into the foreground.
onNoClick() is an event listener used in Java.
view sets are the name of the extension of the view class which is used to contain multiple child views.
ListFragment is the fragment type used to provide several methods for managing a list view.
SharedPreferences is a small collection of key-value set for data persistence.
External storage is always available.
JUnit 4 is a type of testing framework is used within android.
Instrumented tests are tests that run on a hardware device or emulator.
Google Play services be installed within Android Studio in the SDP Manager.
You need an API key to use Google Maps within an Android application.
Dont use the camelCase format is NOT one of the ‘DON’TS’ in the Google Java style.
/* comment */ is the correct syntax for a block comment.
